title: "Recreating meaning from videos"
output: html_document
---

```{r load_packages, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(langcog)

```


```{r }
gram_data <- read_csv(file="data/pt2_data.csv")%>%
  select(-X1)
```


```{r}
gram_data %>%
  filter(diff == "yes", predicate != "static")%>%
  mutate(hol_or_atom = ifelse(hol_or_atom == "0", "holistisch", "sequentiell"))%>%
  group_by(condition,stimulus,hol_or_atom)%>%
  summarise(n = length(unique(id)))%>%
  group_by(condition,stimulus)%>%
  mutate(count = length(hol_or_atom))%>%
  filter(count > 1)
```
